Property.name: EnableSonic
Property.HelpText: Enable custom actions for Sonic. This will disable Tails grab on this character.

Property.name: EnableKnuckles
Property.HelpText: Enable custom actions for Knuckles. This will disable Tails grab on this character.

Property.name: EnableAmy
Property.HelpText: Enable custom actions for Amy. This will disable Tails grab on this character.

Property.name: EnableTornado
Property.HelpText: Enable custom actions for the Tornado planes.

Property.name: EnableTailsGrab
Property.HelpText: Tails can hold another player if he is flying, and the other player jumps on him. Use the 2nd controller to control Tails AI.

Property.name: EnableTailsSpinDash
Property.HelpText: Tails will be able to SpinDash like Sonic using the second attack button (B).

Property.name: EnableTailsSpinTails
Property.HelpText: Tails' tails will go out of his ball when rolling/SpinDashing.

Property.name: EnableKnucklesSpinDash
Property.HelpText: Knuckles will be able to SpinDash like Sonic using the second attack button (B).

Property.name: EnableKnucklesDrillClaw
Property.HelpText: Knuckles will be able to do DrillClaw using the second attack button (B) while jumping or gliding.

Property.name: EnableKnucklesWallDig
Property.HelpText: Knuckles will be able to dig walls using any attack button while climbing if the collision is diggable.

Property.name: DiggableRMWalls
Property.HelpText: The level wall collisions do not have the diggable flag since you cannot dig them, this removes the check.

Property.name: EnableDoubleJump
Property.HelpText: Press Jump two times with Amy to do a double jump.

Property.name: EnableHammerPropeller
Property.HelpText: Hold the action button while in air to do the Hammer Propeller. For the normal hammer attack, press the 2nd action button.
